checks.msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/default-proxy' should be added.

Capability "NET_BIND_SERVICE" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/default-proxy.allow-capability-net-bind-service: SomeReason'.
Capability Drop list should be set to ALL. Add the specific ones you need to the Add list and set an override label.

runAsUser is set to UID 0 (root user) in the container SecurityContext. Either set it to a value > 0 or remove it and set runAsNonRoot to true.
allowPrivilegeEscalation not set which allows privilege escalation. It should be set to 'false'.
